In the [93mpolymerization[0m of [93mo[0m -[93mphthalaldehyde[0m, [93mPD[0m [93mH[0m [93mLi[0m [93m2[0m ([93mHMDS[0m) and [93mPD[0m [93m4[0m-[93mMe[0m [93mLi[0m [93m2[0m ([93mHMDS[0m) [93mgive[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mactivity[0m and [93mhigher[0m [93mselectivity[0m than [93mLiHMDS[0m or [93mbutyllithium[0m, [93mcommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93minitiators[0m for this [93mreaction[0m, and [93malso[0m [93mgive[0m [93mmodest[0m [93mstereoselectivity[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mdetailed[0m [93mcomputational[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mo[0m -[93mphthalaldehyde[0m [93minsertion[0m [93mresulted[0m in a [93mhighly[0m [93mcooperative[0m [93mmechanism[0m, with [93mμ[0m-[93malkoxide[0m [93mbridging[0m of the [93mtwo[0m [93mmetals[0m in the [93mresting[0m [93mstate[0m and with [93mback[0m-[93mcoordination[0m of the [93mfuranyl[0m [93moxygen[0m. [93mAldehyde[0m [93minsertion[0m [93moccurs[0m through [93msynchronous[0m [93mnucleophilic[0m [93maddition[0m and [93mmigration[0m of the [93mchain[0m [93mend[0m [93malkoxide[0m, not by [93maldehyde[0m [93mcoordination[0m and [93minsertion[0m. - [93mReactions[0m of [93mRadical[0m [93mAnions[0m with [93mHydrides[0m: [93mSupercharging[0m [93mElectron[0m [93mUpconversion[0m for [93mElectron[0m [93mCatalysis[0m.: [93mRadical[0m [93manions[0m are [93mwell[0m [93mknown[0m to [93mreact[0m with [93mproton[0m [93mdonors[0m, [93myet[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mreactivity[0m with [93mhydrides[0m [93mremains[0m [93mlargely[0m [93munexplored[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [95minvestigate[0m the [93mreactions[0m of [93mfive[0m [93mstable[0m [93mradical[0m [93manions[0m with [93mB[0m-[93mH[0m and [93mSi[0m-[93mH[0m [93mhydrides[0m ([93mpinacolborane[0m, [93mdiphenylsilane[0m, and [93mtriphenylsilane[0m) and [93muncover[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mclass[0m of [93mchemical[0m [93mreactions[0m. [93mKetyl[0m [93mradical[0m [93manions[0m [93mreact[0m with [93mmain[0m-[93mgroup[0m [93mhydrides[0m, [93mforming[0m [93mC[0m-[93mE[0m and [93mO[0m-[93mH[0m [93mbonds[0m ([93mE[0m = [93mB[0m, [93mSi[0m) through a [93mprocess[0m in which the [93mradical[0m [93manion[0m [93macts[0m [93mboth[0m as a [93mLewis[0m [93mbase[0m and as a [93mH[0m [93matom[0m [93macceptor[0m. These [93mreactions[0m are [93mscalable[0m and [93mdo[0m not [93mrequire[0m [93mconventional[0m [93mcatalysts[0m: [93mEither[0m [93melectric[0m [93mcurrent[0m or [93msubstoichiometric[0m [93mchemical[0m [93mreductants[0m are [93msufficient[0m as the [94msource[0m of [93mcatalytic[0m [93melectrons[0m. [93mAnalogous[0m [93melectron[0m-[93mcatalyzed[0m [93msilylation[0m and [93mborylation[0m are [93malso[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m with [93mquinone[0m [93mradical[0m [93manions[0m and [93minorganic[0m [93mradical[0m [93manions[0m [93msuch[0m as [93msuperoxide[0m.
